targets.query: SELECT node_name, max(cpu_usage_nanocores)/1000000000 AS usage FROM kubernetes_node WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), node_name fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(usage) FROM (SELECT node_name, max(cpu_usage_core_nanoseconds) AS usage FROM kubernetes_node WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), node_name fill(null)) GROUP BY node_name
SELECT node_name, pod_name, max(resource_requests_millicpu_units)/1000 AS requests FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name, node_name fill(null)
SELECT node_name, pod_name, max(resource_limits_millicpu_units)/1000 AS requests FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name, node_name fill(null)
SELECT max(memory_usage_bytes)/max(capacity_memory_bytes) FROM kubernetes_node WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), node_name
SELECT node_name, pod_name, max(resource_requests_memory_bytes) AS requests FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name, node_name fill(null)
SELECT node_name, pod_name, max(resource_requests_memory_bytes) AS requests FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name, node_name fill(null)
SELECT pod_name, max(cpu_usage_nanocores)/1000000000 AS usage FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(usage) FROM (SELECT pod_name, max(cpu_usage_core_nanoseconds) AS usage FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)) GROUP BY pod_name
SELECT pod_name, max(resource_requests_millicpu_units)/1000 AS requests FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)
SELECT pod_name, max(resource_limits_millicpu_units)/1000 AS limits FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)
SELECT pod_name, max(memory_usage_bytes) AS usage FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)
SELECT pod_name, max(resource_requests_memory_bytes) AS requests FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)
SELECT pod_name, max(resource_limits_memory_bytes) AS limits FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(bytes) FROM (SELECT pod_name, max(tx_bytes) AS bytes FROM kubernetes_pod_network WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)) GROUP BY pod_name

SELECT non_negative_derivative(bytes) FROM (SELECT pod_name, max(rx_bytes) AS bytes FROM kubernetes_pod_network WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)) GROUP BY pod_name

SELECT max(restarts_total) AS restarts FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' AND pod_name = '${pod}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name, node_name fill(null)

SELECT max(cpu_usage_nanocores)/1000000000 AS usage, max(resource_requests_millicpu_units)/1000 as requests, max(resource_limits_millicpu_units)/1000 as limits FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' AND pod_name = '${pod}' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(usage) FROM (SELECT pod_name, max(cpu_usage_core_nanoseconds) AS usage FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' AND pod_name='${pod}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)) GROUP BY pod_name

SELECT max(memory_usage_bytes) AS usage, max(resource_requests_memory_bytes) as requests, max(resource_limits_memory_bytes) as limits FROM kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' AND pod_name='${pod}' GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(max(tx_bytes))*8 AS tx, non_negative_derivative(max(rx_bytes))*8 AS rx FROM kubernetes_pod_network WHERE $timeFilter AND namespace = '${namespace}' AND pod_name='${pod}' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: select distinct(namespace) from (select cpu_usage_core_nanoseconds, namespace from kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY pod_name)
list.name: namespace
list.query: select distinct(namespace) from (select cpu_usage_core_nanoseconds, namespace from kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY pod_name)

list.definition: select distinct(pod_name) from (select cpu_usage_core_nanoseconds, pod_name from kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter and namespace='${namespace}' GROUP BY pod_name)
list.name: pod
list.query: select distinct(pod_name) from (select cpu_usage_core_nanoseconds, pod_name from kubernetes_pod_container WHERE $timeFilter and namespace='${namespace}' GROUP BY pod_name)
